mean_en: a style of art that originated in the early 20th century in which objects are divided into and shown as a group of geometric shapes and from many different angles at the same time
sentence: We're studying cubism in Art History class.
sentence_trans: 我们正在艺术史课上研习立体主义。
word_etyma: cub=cube立体的+ism学术流派 →立体派
